objects.text: • Sterling Silver • Rose Gold Finish • Gift for Her

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a soft, elegant aesthetic with a pastel peach-to-pink gradient background. At its center is a white circular frame bordered in soft pink, housing a high-quality image of a jewelry product (ID: `product_image`). The heading text layer (ID: `heading`) is prominently displayed in bold dark brown uppercase typography, while the subtitle (ID: `subheading`) sits below it in a serif font, also in brown. A price badge (ID: `price`) in white font over a circular rose-red gradient background is positioned over the image. A feature list (ID: `description`) is elegantly arranged in a line at the bottom. A call-to-action button (rect and text layers with IDs: `cta_background` and `cta`) is neatly placed beneath in coral red with white text.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #FFE4E1 → #FFDAB9
- Circle Border: #FFC0CB
- Price Badge: #F08080 → #FF6B6B
- Accent Elements: #F08080
- Text (Primary, Feature): #8B4513
- CTA Button: #F08080
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases intricately designed earrings with a delicate blend of rose gold and clear crystals. The dominant color is a rose gold-pink hue (#F4A6A6), used for the metal framework and floral petal shapes. This warm tone provides a luxurious, sophisticated feel. The earrings are adorned with white diamond-like stones (#FFFFFF), adding a brilliant contrast and sparkle. Accents of crystal-clear translucence (#E6E6E6) are used in marquise-shaped gems, offering variety and elegance. The blending of soft metallic pink with crystal highlights creates a visually harmonious and eye-catching product, ideal for an advertisement with a gentle, feminine, and classy color palette.
